links.title: Books of the world, stand up and be counted! All 129,864,880 of you.
links.description: Posted by Leonid Taycher, software engineer When you are part of a company that is trying to digitize all the books in the world, the first…

links.title: The Perils of ISBN
links.description: Last year I got into using Letterboxd, to complement my goal of watching more (good) movies. It’s got a really clean interface, the social features are useful but unobtrusive, and it makes remembering what I’ve watched and when I watched it easy. So why isn’t there a Letterboxd for books?
